sources.title: Intrigue (1947) George Raft, June Havoc, Helena Carter
sources.description: Intrigue is a 1947 American FILM NOlR crime film directed by Edwin L. Marin and starring George Raft, June Havoc and Helena Carter. Intrigue was intended to be the first of a number of films Raft made, with producer Sam Bischoff, for his own production company,    You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .

metadata.Plot: Dishonorably discharged from the Army Air Corps, Brad Dunham disconsolately decides to try his luck with Shanghai's postwar black market.
metadata.Actors: George Raft, June Havoc, Helena Carter
